pages.text: Blaze powder is needed to heat a $(l:brewing_stand#brewing_stand)brewing stand$(/l).$(br2)A kettle needs to be placed on top of a heat source. You can set it on top of a campfire or stove.$(br2)You can craft these using the crafting table or workbench.
The magma block can also be used as a heat source for the Kettle.

pages.title: Magma Block Recipe
pages.text: You can craft this using the crafting table or workbench.
